quote1: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence, intelligent planning, and focused effort.
quote2: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
quote3: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quote4: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quote5: Lost time is never found again.
quote6: Amateurs sit and wait for inspiration, the rest of us just get up and go to work.
quote7: It's not knowing what to do, it's doing what you know.
quote8: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
quote9: Your mind is for having ideas, not holding them.
quote10: You don’t need a new plan for next year. You need a commitment.
quote11: Success is often achieved by those who don't know that failure is inevitable.
quote12: Great acts are made up of small deeds.
quote13: Simplicity boils down to two steps: Identify the essential. Eliminate the rest.
quote14: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quote15: What you do today can improve all your tomorrows.
quote16: Action is the foundational key to all success.
quote17: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
quote18: Ordinary people think merely of spending time, great people think of using it.
quote19: Either you run the day or the day runs you.
quote20: Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
quote21: Being busy is not the same as being productive.
quote22: If you spend too much time thinking about a thing, you’ll never get it done.
quote24: Concentrate all your thoughts upon the work in hand.
quote25: Do the hard jobs first. The easy jobs will take care of themselves.
quote26: A year from now you may wish you had started today.
quote27: Small deeds done are better than great deeds planned.
quote28: Time is the most valuable thing a man can spend.
quote29: The future depends on what you do today.
quote30: Motivation gets you going, but discipline keeps you growing.
quote31: Work gives you meaning and purpose and life is empty without it.
quote32: Do not wait; the time will never be ‘just right.’ Start where you stand.
quote33: Be not afraid of growing slowly, be afraid only of standing still.
quote34: A goal without a plan is just a wish.
quote35: Hustle beats talent when talent doesn't hustle.
quote36: If you want to be more productive, you need to become master of your minutes.
quote38: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quote39: Push yourself, because no one else is going to do it for you.
quote40: Work until your idols become your rivals.
quote41: Hard work beats talent when talent doesn't work hard.
quote42: If you get tired, learn to rest, not to quit.
quote43: Success doesn't come from what you do occasionally, it comes from what you do consistently.
quote44: Opportunities don't happen. You create them.
quote45: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
quote46: The key is not to prioritize what's on your schedule, but to schedule your priorities.
quote48: Dream it. Wish it. Do it.
quote49: Sometimes later becomes never. Do it now.
quote50: Great things never come from comfort zones.
quote52: Don't stop when you're tired. Stop when you're done.
quote53: Wake up with determination. Go to bed with satisfaction.
quote54: Do something today that your future self will thank you for.
quote56: It's going to be hard, but hard does not mean impossible.
quote57: Don’t wait for opportunity. Create it.
quote58: Sometimes we're tested not to show our weaknesses, but to discover our strengths.
quote59: The harder you work for something, the greater you’ll feel when you achieve it.
quote60: Dream it. Believe it. Build it.
quote61: Start small, stay consistent, and watch massive results unfold.
quote62: Consistency is more important than perfection.
quote63: Believe in yourself and all that you are.
quote64: You are capable of amazing things.
quote65: Be stubborn about your goals and flexible about your methods.
quote66: Your only limit is your mind.
quote67: Don't limit your challenges, challenge your limits.
quote68: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
quote69: Don't count the days, make the days count.
quote70: Action is the antidote to procrastination.
quote72: The best view comes after the hardest climb.
quote73: When you feel like quitting, think about why you started.
quote74: Success is what comes after you stop making excuses.
quote75: Train your mind to see the good in every situation.
quote76: Work hard in silence. Let success make the noise.
quote77: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quote78: Doubt kills more dreams than failure ever will.
quote79: Keep your eyes on the stars, and your feet on the ground.
quote80: Failure is not the opposite of success; it’s part of success.
quote81: Strength doesn’t come from what you can do. It comes from overcoming the things you once thought you couldn’t.
quote83: Productivity is less about what you do with your time and more about how you run your mind.
quote85: Start where you are. Use what you have. Do what you can.
quote86: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quote87: Do not wait to strike till the iron is hot; but make it hot by striking.
quote88: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quote90: Don't be afraid to give up the good to go for the great.
quote91: If you want to make an easy job seem mighty hard, just keep putting it off.
quote92: The expert in anything was once a beginner.
quote93: The secret of success is to do the common thing uncommonly well.
quote94: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quote95: The best way to predict your future is to create it.
quote96: If you want something you've never had, you must be willing to do something you've never done.
quote97: Motivation will almost always beat mere talent.
quote98: A little progress each day adds up to big results.
quote99: Stop doubting yourself, work hard, and make it happen.
quote100: Greatness only comes before hustle in the dictionary.
